class.name: ModuleMoveDirection

class.desc: An enum to specify where a module should move next.

constant.name: TO_NEXT
constant.desc: Directs the module to move forward once.

constant.name: TO_FIRST_CHILD
constant.desc: Directs the module to move to the first child of the current node.

constant.name: TO_PARENT
constant.desc: Directs the module to move to the immediate parent of the node.

constant.name: TO_END
constant.desc: Directs the module to move to the end of the node, so that it's child node is the last.
